name: Venom Road

trigger.text: If your opponent has 6 or more DON!! cards, your opponent returns 1 of their DON!! cards to their DON!! deck.

text:
[Main] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
[Trigger] If your opponent has 6 or more DON!! cards, your opponent returns 1 of their DON!! cards to their DON!! deck.

effect.text: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
If your opponent has 6 or more DON!! cards, your opponent returns 1 of their DON!! cards to their DON!! deck.
